definition: see 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Now they are singing and dancing around the radish, how happy they are!
sentences.chinese: 他們一起圍着大蘿蔔唱歌，跳舞。

sentences.english: The small white rabbit ate the radish radish, put on the table.
sentences.chinese: 小白兔就喫掉了小蘿蔔，把大蘿蔔放在桌子上。

sentences.english: D. Edison Chen is a goddamned rich philanderer.
sentences.chinese: 陳冠希是一個有錢的花心大蘿蔔。

sentences.english: Uncle pulled out many big turnip.
You are playboy. Which girl did you like best?
sentences.chinese: 你個歡心大蘿蔔。你最喜歡哪一個啊？
